item.materialis.wrench.description:
The Wrench is a common tool among engineers. It can efficiently break machines and has room for many abilities.
Right Click: Rotate block
material.materialis.alfsteel.encyclopedi: Has a 40% chance per level to fire a beam, this costs mana or durability if you have no mana
material.materialis.aluminum.encyclopedi: -10% attack damage, +15% attack speed per level
material.materialis.brass.encyclopedia: Adds +1.5 attack damage per level that degrades as durability goes down
material.materialis.cloggrum.encyclopedi: Repairing the tool costs up to half as much the higher the durability the tool has
material.materialis.crystal_matrix.encyc: Adds 50% mining speed and attack damage per level
material.materialis.draconium.encycloped: Has a 10% chance of using 200 RF instead of durability per level
material.materialis.draconium_awakened.e: Increases mining speed with 2.5 and attack damage with 1.5 per level, costs 100 RF per level
material.materialis.dreamwood.encycloped: increases mining speed with 2.5 per level, mana cost increases with level
material.materialis.ebony_psimetal.encyc: Adds up to 1 extra attack damage that scales with the amount of psi you have per level
material.materialis.elementium.encyclope: Adds a 3% chance to spawn a pixie while holding the tool per level
material.materialis.fairy.encyclopedia: Adds the percentage of health lost multiplied by the level to your mining speed
material.materialis.fairy.flavor: From the fairy depths of hell.
material.materialis.flux_infused.encyclo: Increases mining speed with 2.5 and attack damage with 1.5 per level, costs 100 RF per level
material.materialis.forgotten_metal.ency: Deals 50% extra damage to undergarden mobs per level, +25% mining speed on undergarden blocks per level
material.materialis.forgotten_metal.flav: It's the uhhh umm, y- I uhhhh ermmmm...
material.materialis.froststeel.encyclope: Applies 7.5 seconds of slowness to attacked mobs per level
material.materialis.iesnium.encyclopedia: Allows the tool to harvest otherworld blocks
material.materialis.ivory_psimetal.encyc: Adds up to 1 extra mining speed that scales with the amount of psi you have per level
material.materialis.livingwood.encyclope: increases attack damage with 1.5 per level, mana cost increases with level
material.materialis.manasteel.encycloped: Has a 10% chance of using mana instead of durability per level
material.materialis.neptunium.encycloped: 1.25x damage to submerged mobs, no mining speed penalty when underwater
material.materialis.nickel.encyclopedia: Adds half a second of burning per level to targets that are on fire
material.materialis.pewter.encyclopedia: -5% attack speed, +10% attack damage per level
material.materialis.pink_slime.encyclope: Overslime can be eaten to restore 1 hunger and 0.1 saturation per level
material.materialis.pink_slime.flavor: Do you have any idea where that's been?
material.materialis.psimetal.encyclopedi: Casts the selected spell on block break for tools and on attack for weapons, also adds one spell socket
material.materialis.quicksilver.encyclop: Tool no longer takes durability damage from usages but has a 1% chance of losing durability every second
material.materialis.refined_glowstone.en: Adds the mining speed, multiplied by the level, divided by 80, to the attack speed
material.materialis.refined_radiance.enc: Applies 20 seconds of glowing to attacked mobs and leaves a glowing air block when a block is mined that despawns eventually
material.materialis.rose_quartz.encyclop: Grants 1 extra upgrade slot per part
material.materialis.rose_quartz.flavor: Disclaimer: Not actually made with roses.
material.materialis.shadow_steel.encyclo: Voids all dropped items from mob kills and broken blocks, drops bonus xp instead
material.materialis.starmetal.encycloped: Tool gains 2 mining speed per level at midnight
material.materialis.starmetal.flavor: Not to be confused with star cutting metal.
material.materialis.terrasteel.encyclope: Has a 40% chance per level to fire a beam, this costs mana or durability if you have no mana
material.materialis.uranium.encyclopedia: Tool takes up to twice as much durability damage when above a quarter durability and increasingly less damage below a quarter durability
material.materialis.utherium.encyclopedi: Deals 25% extra damage to rotspawn per level
modifier.materialis.adrenaline.descripti: Boosts attack damage when your health is low
modifier.materialis.arcane.description: Deals a small amount of extra magic damage to attacked targets
modifier.materialis.auxiliary_power.desc: Boosts your attack speed based on your mining speed
modifier.materialis.bedrock_breaker.desc: Allows the tool to harvest bedrock
modifier.materialis.brittle.description: Tool takes much more durability damage
modifier.materialis.capacitor.descriptio: Increases the energy capacity of the tool by 10000
modifier.materialis.capacitor.flavor: This is what makes time travel possible, the flux capacitor
modifier.materialis.colorized.descriptio: Adds a decorative colorizer to your tool
modifier.materialis.cosmic_luck.descript: Gives you many more nice things when mining or killing mobs!
modifier.materialis.cosmic_unbreakable.d: Tool no longer takes damage from normal usage
modifier.materialis.create_wrenching.des: Tool can dismantle kinetic components by sneak-right clicking
modifier.materialis.crystalline.descript: Adds 50% extra mining speed and attack damage
modifier.materialis.daredevil.descriptio: Boosts mining speed when your health is low
modifier.materialis.decay.description: Your tool doesn't use durability on use but instead decays over time
modifier.materialis.economical.descripti: Repairing your tool is cheaper when your tool has low durability
modifier.materialis.elven_beam.descripti: When attacking with your tool you have a chance of firing a beam of mana
modifier.materialis.elven_beam.flavor: Science cannot yet explain how it works
modifier.materialis.engineers_goggles.de: Shows additional information when looking at kinetic devices
modifier.materialis.enhanced_quartz.desc: Rose quartz goes great with a bonus upgrade!
modifier.materialis.featherweight.descri: Decreases attack damage but increases attack speed
modifier.materialis.fluxburner.descripti: Boosts mining speed at the cost of energy
modifier.materialis.fluxripper.descripti: Boosts attack damage at the cost of energy
modifier.materialis.fluxshield.descripti: Has a chance of protecting your tool from damage at the cost of energy
modifier.materialis.galvanized.descripti: Trades two upgrade slots for an ability slot
modifier.materialis.half_life.descriptio: Your tool loses durability faster when it has high durability and loses durability slower when it has low durability
Tool can assemble multiblocks and configure sides of certain blocks
modifier.materialis.inertia.description: Decreases attack speed but increases attack damage
modifier.materialis.lesser_psionizing_ra: Your tool is highly conductive to psions and is suitable for casting spells
modifier.materialis.lesser_spell_casting: Adds the ability to cast spells on right-click but removes the ability to cast spells on block breaking and attacking
modifier.materialis.manaburner.descripti: Boosts mining speed at the cost of mana
modifier.materialis.manaripper.descripti: Boosts attack damage at the cost of mana
modifier.materialis.manashield.descripti: Has a chance of protecting your tool from damage at the cost of mana
modifier.materialis.neptunes_blessing.de: Increases damage to submerged mobs and allows you to mine normally while swimming
modifier.materialis.nocturnal.descriptio: gives bonus mining speed during the night, most powerful at midnight
modifier.materialis.old_timer.descriptio: Repairing your tool is more expensive when your tool has high durability
modifier.materialis.otherworld_goggles.d: Allows you to see blocks from the other place, can be toggled with sneak + helmet interact
modifier.materialis.otherworldly.descrip: Allows the tool to harvest blocks from The Other Place
modifier.materialis.overeating.descripti: That overslime buffer on your tool suddenly looks very appealing
modifier.materialis.overweight.descripti: Eats some mining speed and attack damage to gain more overslime capacity
modifier.materialis.pixiecaller.descript: Has a chance of spawning a pixie when you take damage while holding the tool
modifier.materialis.polished.description: Deals more damage at a higher durability
modifier.materialis.polished.flavor: I can see my face in it!
modifier.materialis.power_hungry.descrip: Using the tool costs 100 RF per durability per level, the tool doesn't seem to work so well if it's not powered
modifier.materialis.psicho_digger.descri: Adds bonus mining speed depending on how much psi you currently have
modifier.materialis.psicho_killer.descri: Deals bonus attack damage depending on how much psi you currently have
modifier.materialis.psionizing_radiation: Your tool is highly conductive to psions and is suitable for casting spells, +1 spell socket
Enables the tool to cast spells when attacking
Enables the tool to cast spells when breaking blocks
Enables the tool to cast spells when taking damage
Enables the tool to cast spells when a spell is detonated nearby
Enables the tool to cast spells when taking fire damage
Enables the tool to cast spells when your health is low
Enables the tool to cast spells when jumping
Enables the tool to cast spells when entering darkness
Enables the tool to cast spells when the selected sensor is triggered
Enables the tool to cast spells every tick
Enables the tool to cast spells when underwater
modifier.materialis.psishield.descriptio: Has a chance of protecting your tool from damage at the cost of psi
modifier.materialis.quenching.descriptio: Extinguishes mobs and deals bonus damage depending on how much longer the mob would have burned
modifier.materialis.reactive.description: Has a chance to cast the inscribed spell on use
modifier.materialis.reactive.flavor: Not to be confused with radioactive
modifier.materialis.reaping.description: Killing undead mobs will destroy their bodies and crystallize their souls, seems to have an affection towards scythes
modifier.materialis.refueling.descriptio: Attacked mobs that are on fire will burn for longer
modifier.materialis.residual_light.descr: Leaves behind pieces of light (photons) when hitting mobs leaving them glowing or when breaking blocks leaving the air glowing for some time
modifier.materialis.runed.description: Tool glows with a colored enchantment glint
modifier.materialis.skullfire.descriptio: Beheads skeletons and scorches them black
modifier.materialis.spell_casting.descri: Adds the ability to cast spells on right-click but removes the ability to cast spells on block breaking and attacking, +1 spell socket
modifier.materialis.spell_socket.descrip: Adds one psi spell socket to your tool
modifier.materialis.supermassive.descrip: Greatly increases the amount of knockback dealt to enemies
modifier.materialis.terrabeam.descriptio: When attacking with your tool you have a chance of firing a beam of mana
modifier.materialis.thermal_wrenching.de: Tool can dismantle thermal machines by sneak-right clicking
modifier.materialis.underlord.descriptio: Deals more damage to non-boss undergarden mobs and mines undergarden blocks faster
modifier.materialis.voiding.description: Voids block and mob drops, drops extra experience instead
modifier.materialis.work_hardened.descri: Your tool loses durability slower when it has low durability
modifier.materialis.wrenching.descriptio: Tool can rotate blocks by right clicking
recipe.materialis.add_modifier.too_many_: This change adds too many sockets to the tool
recipe.materialis.modifier.casting_requi: Casting requires Psionizing Radiation or Psi Decay to apply
recipe.materialis.modifier.create_wrench: Mechanical Wrenching requires Wrenching to apply
recipe.materialis.modifier.immersive_wre: Immersive Hammering requires Wrenching to apply
recipe.materialis.modifier.pipe_wrenchin: Pipe Wrenching requires Wrenching to apply
recipe.materialis.modifier.reactive_requ: Reactive requires a different recipe for every level
recipe.materialis.modifier.skullfire_req: Skullfire requires Severing V to apply
recipe.materialis.modifier.thermal_wrenc: Thermal Wrenching requires Wrenching to apply
recipe.materialis.remove_modifier.spell_: This change removes a socket that currently contains a spell
